body: Mostapha, I downloaded the latest cumSky userObject from the gitHub but I still have banding on the diffuse sky. See image below. It is not the same as my original error, but still looks unnatural. Could there be another bug?   Original error [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/E6-J*b1OZQOX93x8qn5Ox7I8NJZR2imgoyH5y6iZxJSQBqnGCIWEF5pDKU09t6*h3mDgArFTWtKaoTs0Rj530bdT5N8q5Ccu/cumSkyReinhartstrangeoutput.jpg)   sky using 11/08 version [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/E6-J*b1OZQNdyE5PZhRtCB7A4hXJSTb9MtiEFLPTCDfEGtjfpawkqPBcc*mk7DuwqRR4nmJyRuVnDOO1GWuaaAgpXC6*XVgE/2014.11.08cumSkyReinhartstrangeoutput.jpg)
